job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: Born out of MIT VulcanForms is commercializing the first fully scalable industrial metal additive manufacturing AM solution Building the worlds most powerful and advanced metal AM system is the first step towards our vision of lightsout highest quality metal AM mass production We are a team of leading technology and operational experts with decades of experience in advanced manufacturing materials automation and robotics We are continuously seeking contributors who demonstrate outstanding integrity intelligence hunger accountability and a passion for learningbrbrstronguJob SummarybrbrustrongVulcanForms is currently seeking a strongMachine Learning Engineerstrong with a focus on operations to join our Machine Learning and Data Science team in strongBurlington MAstrong As a machine learning engineer you will develop and maintain ML pipelines deploy and monitor ML models  data analytics in production for our cuttingedge metal Additive Manufacturing factory You will have a unique opportunity to push the frontier of ML applications in additive manufacturingbrbrstronguEssential Functions And Responsibilitiesbrustrongul liBuild maintain and manage endtoend ML training and deployment pipelinesbrli liDeploy monitor and optimize ML models and data analytics in the edge onpremises and in the cloud for Additive Manufacturingli liDevelop software that integrate ML pipelines within the additive manufacturing processli liWorking with our additive manufacturing and process control experts to identify and solve technical painpoints to expand the application of Machine Learning and data analysis in AMli brbrulstronguRequired Qualificationsbrustrongul liMaster of Science degree in Computer Science Data Science or related field with 1 years of relevant work experience or Bachelor of Science degree in relevant field with 3 years of relevant work experience or PhD in relevant fieldbrli liHandson experience training and deploying machine learning modelsli liFamiliarity with at least one of the Deep Learning frameworks Ie TensorFlow PyTorchli liProficient in Python and its Machine Learning stacksli liStrong programming skills familiarity with software development cycles solid understanding of data structures and algorithmsli liThis position must satisfy ITAR compliance requirements therefore candidates must be US Citizens or lawful Permanent Residents of the US Green Card Holdersli brbrulstronguPreferred Qualificationsbrustrongul liPh D in relevant fieldbrli liExperience of deploying deep learning models for lowlatency applications and in the edgeli liExperience with Docker or other containerization technologiesli liExperience with microservicesli liExperience with Cli liA desire to stay current with opensource ML ecosystemsli liSelfmotivated capable of setting and reaching ambitious goalsli liTeam player with excellent communication skillsli liAdditive Manufacturing AM industry experienceli liExperience working in a fastpaced startup company environmentli brbrulustrongBenefitsbrstronguul liMedical dental vision and life insurance available to you starting on your first day of employmentbrli liGenerous time off package including vacation PTO sick PTO and 11 companypaid federal holidaysli liFlexible work scheduleli li401k with company match and stock optionsliul
